transcript:
Customer: Ji sir.
Customer: Sir sir aap phone kaat de rahe ho. Maine kaha tha sir maine bhi sir mere baat kar lo aap. Phone kaat diya.
Executive: Main bahut ek laga raha tha mujhe sunai na aati sir.
Customer: Main ye keh raha hu ki aapne saare product delete kyu kar di. Saare product inactive kar ke rakhe hain aapne.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Aur aapne jo ye product inactive kar ke rakhe hain saare product aur unki budget consume kar rahe hain aap.
Executive: Kiski cheez ki?
Customer: Lo ek baar baat kar lo aap. Ye lo baat karo.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello, Namaste sir. Vijay bol raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Namaste sir, Vijay bol raha hu IndiaMART se. Main ye keh raha tha, hello, ki sir ye aapne ki ne kaafi saare jo product hain aapke.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Wo aapne matlab bahut saare delete kar diye product catalog mein se sir aapne. Aapne ki matlab budget bhi consume ho rahi thi uski to.
Executive: Sir maine delete nahi kiye. Wo Nanak sir ne karaye the mere se shuru mein hi. Jab maine start kiya tha kaam ki inhe delete kar dijiyega. Aur Abhishek sir se pehle Nitesh sir the. Ek Nitesh sir aur Nanak sir inhone hi jab mera wo banaya tha catalog to unhone delete karaya tha wo.
Customer: Ye aapne 100 KVA distribution transformer delete kar rakha hai. 63 KVA distribution transformer delete kiya hua hai. Three phase distribution transformer delete ho rakha hai aapka. Uske baad aapka
Executive: Nanak sir. Nanak sir aur Nitesh sir ne hi karaya tha delete mere se. Bole the main naya nayi series se wo bana raha hu.
Customer: Sir ek baar aap na kya naam hai aap used transformer mein bhi deal karte ho used wale mein?
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: To ye wala aapka product dala nahi hua catalog ke andar. Sir aap na agar video meeting pe aao. Main aapko dikhata hu saari cheeze ek baar main aapko sir.
Executive: Ji sir. Aap kitni der mein aa jaoge aap ek baar video meeting pe sir aap.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir ek second. Main phone kar ke dekh raha hu. Ji sir ek second bas.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji sir. Ye Nanak sir ne aur Nitesh sir ne delete karaya tha usme 100 KVA tha sir aur apna 200 KVA tha, 315 tha, 400 tha sir ye Nanak sir ne shuru mein delete karaye the Nitesh sir ne. Kaha tha ki hum dobara se bana rahe hain aapka apna. Ek baar dekho kya naam hai oil cooled servo stabilizer aapne dala hua tha wo delete kar diya. Outdoor VCB panel dala hua tha wo delete ho gaya. Indoor VCB panel dala tha wo bhi delete ho gaya.
Customer: Ye to sir maine nahi kiye delete. Ye to dale hue the dalwaye the maine.
Executive: Aap aao sir Sandeep to keh raha hu na ye out of stock mark ho rakhi hai ek baar aao to sahi online main aapka catalog sahi kar deta hu main aapko 10 minute lagenge bas.
Customer: Theek hai sir ek second. Kitni der mein aa jaoge? Abhi aa rahe ho?
Customer: Bolna hai mere ko IndiaMART bolna hai.
Executive: Ek second ji aapko video meeting ka link bhej rahe hain ek baar aap usse join karo phir video meeting ko. Join sir aapko link bhej rahe hain sir aapko.
Customer: Hello. Main bahar aaya hua tha sir main. Bhejna abhi. Kitna kitna time lagega bhejne mein?
Executive: Abhi bhej do is bhai. WhatsApp pe bhejna hai?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir WhatsApp pe bhej do sir. Sir ek second line par rahoge abhi. Phone mat kaatna abhi.
Executive: Ji sir. Sir ek baar email confirm kara dijiye jo usme aapki lagi hai na email.
Customer: Ji. India Pandit Sumit.
Executive: Ek second sir boliye.
Customer: Pandit Sumit 794@gmail.com.
Executive: Achcha dekhna ek baar aapke mail pe aayi kya mail.
Customer: Abhi phone kar ke check kar lijiye. Abhi kuch nahi aaya sir mail pe.
Customer: Abhi nahi aaya? Bheja hai sir maine ek second.
Customer: Dekho sir ab aaya. Kuch nahi aaya sir mail par ab. Hain?
Customer: Dekho ab aaya hoga.
Customer: Mail confirm karao main ek baar aapko.
Customer: Pandit Sumit Pandit Sumit 794@gmail.com.
Customer: Pandit Sumit 794@gmail.com. Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Aur ek baar ye number WhatsApp pe hai na ye wala?
Executive: Ji sir ye WhatsApp number hai sir mera ye. Ek baar line pe reh ke check kariye ki aapke WhatsApp pe mail aayi hai koi.
Customer: WhatsApp pe dekhta hu sir. WhatsApp par bhi nahi hai abhi sir kuch bhi.
Customer: Sir ek second ruko main WhatsApp pe bata raha hu aapko. Aap aapne jispe wo bheja tha mujhe abhi ka wo screenshot diya tha mujhe aapne. Usse check kiya usse usse bhejna na mujhe. WhatsApp par bhi nahi hai sir.
Customer: Main ye keh raha hu jispe aapne mujhe photo bheji thi na abhi.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Usse bhej dunga link. Haan us usse bhej do link haan.
Executive: Achcha ek second dekhna ek baar check karna ab aaya hai kya WhatsApp pe.
Customer: Ab aa gaya sir. Aa gaya aa gaya.
Customer: Theek hai isko isko join karo.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know why products were deleted.

- Budget being consumed for inactive products.

- Products missing from the catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive says Nanak and Nitesh Sir deleted products.

- Executive offered to correct the catalog via video meeting.

- Executive sent video meeting link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join the video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product deletion, catalog, video meeting, email, whatsapp
